title: Tenn. Detention Facility Explores How To Control Rough Teens
teaser: A youth detention center in Nashville is making international headlines because of a series of riots and mass breakouts over the past month. Advocates point to Missouri as an exemplary model. There, the hardest youth are placed in very small residential centers that feel more like summer camp than jail.
